data.title: Language Courses - LOQUI Sprach- und Bildungsinstitut Wien
data.meta_description: Learn German, English, French, Spanish, Russian or an other language in the city centre of Vienna. Group courses at a low cost, e.g. German course, 4 weeks, 260 Euros.
data.text:
Do you need a German language certificate for your residence permit or visa? Do you want to go abroad or advance your career?

If so, LOQUI is the right place for you! Whether it is German, English, French, Spanish, Italian or any other language: our language trainers will support you with their dedication and expertise, helping you to become proficient in the language you wish to learn. We guarantee quick and effective learning progress.

Further Information

LOQUI Sprach- und Bildungsinstitut enables you to take German language exams at the A1, A2, B1, B2, C1 and C2 levels. You need this exam to receive a certificate for your residence permit, to apply for Austrian citizenship or to study at Austrian universities.

Our price: 160 Euro for ÖIF Integration A2 or B1 exam!

Further Information

You can expand your language skills at a low cost and benefit from different grant options. We are happy to provide information about these options and prepare a cost estimate for the various grant-making agencies. Additionally, our institute is certified by Ö-Cert and Wien-Cert, which means that waff and Arbeiterkammer might be able to provide you with financial support. The City of Vienna issues the Vienna Language Voucher to immigrants to help them to learn German. This voucher can be redeemed at our school.

Further Information
